root.name: Diggs Nightcrawler
root.description: OverviewDiggs Nightcrawler is a PlayStation 3 game developed by Moonbot Studios that uses the Wonderbook to control the game. It tells the story of Diggs Nightcrawler, a private eye in the "film noir"-type world of Library City, a place made up of books, as he goes about solving crimes based on children's stories such as Humpty Dumpty, Itsy-Bitsy Spider, Little Bo Peep. Players work their way through the story by tilting and turning the pages of the Wonderbook peripheral.
